purpose: To provide a robust solution for complex question answering using Retrieval-Augmented Generation techniques.
principle: Leverages graph-based algorithms to enhance the retrieval and generation process in RAG models.
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with APIs for easy integration into various applications requiring advanced question answering capabilities.
limitations: Primarily designed for English language processing; may require significant computational resources for large-scale deployments.
name: Controllable-RAG-Agent
description: This repository provides an advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) solution for complex question answering. It uses sophisticated graph based algorithm to handle the tasks.
highlight: Advanced RAG solution utilizing sophisticated graph-based algorithms for complex question answering.
